EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 5_IDC Path to digital transformation
EmailTemplate.subject: Experts share: The path to digital transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> What you need to know about digital transformation Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
The world is moving to the cloud. Getting there will require network transformation, and that is a game changer.
IDC experts believe software-defined networking (SDN) and network virtualization can provide the agile, flexible foundation for a successful transformation.
Get all the details in the IDC Technology Spotlight, “SDN and network virtualization hold the key to transformation <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2220.Gamechanger.IDC.Spotlight.V2.html?did=d000000000ai&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 5b-idcspotlight&utm_term=finance]]>.”
I hope that you enjoy this white paper! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
